sen.j: 久自国造（くじのくにのみやつこ・くじこくぞう)は常陸国北中部を支配した国造。
sen.e: Kujinomiyatsuko (also known as Kujikokuzo) was Kujinomiyatsuko ruled the north central part of Hitachi Province.
Kuji no kuninomiyatsuko (also known as Kujikokuzo) was kuninomiyatsuko (local ruling families in ancient Japan) ruled the north central part of Hitachi Province.
sen.cmt: 表記変更スペルミス修正local ruling families in ancient Japan を追加しました。
sen.e: Kuji no kuninomiyatsuko (also known as Kujikokuzo) was kuninomiyatsuko (local ruling families in ancient Japan) ruled the north central part of Hitachi Province.

sen.j: 『国造本紀』によると、成務天皇朝に伊香色雄の3世孫の船瀬宿禰が久自国造に任じられたという。
sen.e: According to "Kuninomiyatsuko hongi", Funasesukune, the third generation from Ikagashikoo, was appointed Kujinomiyatsuko during the reign of Emperor Seimu.
According to "Kokuzo hongi," Funasesukune, the third generation from Ikagashikoo, was appointed Kuji no kuninomiyatsuko during the reign of Emperor Seimu.
sen.cmt: Kuninomiyatsuko→Kokuzoカンマの位置を調整スペルミス修正
sen.e: According to "Kokuzo hongi," Funasesukune, the third generation from Ikagashikoo, was appointed Kuji no kuninomiyatsuko during the reign of Emperor Seimu.

sen.j: 釆女氏または丈部氏のち有道氏。
sen.e: The Uneme clan or the Hasetsukabe clan, later the Arudo clan.
The Uneme clan or the Hasetsukabe clan, later the Arudo clan.
The Uneme clan or the Hasetsukabe clan, later the Arudo clan.
Kuji Gun, Hitachi Province.
Kuji Gun, Hitachi Province.
Kuji Gun, Hitachi Province.

sen.j: 現在の茨城県日立市・常陸太田市など。
sen.e: Present Hitachi City, Hitachiota City and the like, Ibaraki Prefecture.
Present Hitachi City, Hitachiota City and the like, Ibaraki Prefecture.
Present Hitachi City, Hitachiota City and the like, Ibaraki Prefecture.

sen.j: 稲村神社 ...... 茨城県常陸太田市。
sen.e: The Inamura-jinja Shrine: Hitachiota City, Ibaraki Prefecture.
The Inamura-jinja Shrine: Hitachiota City, Ibaraki Prefecture.
The Inamura-jinja Shrine: Hitachiota City, Ibaraki Prefecture.
The enshrined deity was Nigihayahinomikoto.
The enshrined deity was Nigihayahi no mikoto.
The enshrined deity was Nigihayahi no mikoto.
